creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: three-panel huipil; no neck opening; open sides; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; dense brocade in central panel, geometric designs with zigzags, red predominates in design with accents of blue, green and yellow; side panels have rows of simple patterning, with a heavier band of zigzags at lower edges.
title: Huipil used as a shawl
